markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Traits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1317)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 185</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Alignment traits don’t exist, and anything that has those traits loses them. Effects that require the traits to function, like [_protection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=238), don’t exist.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Traits
search_markdown:
